title: Flying Sword
contents: property | Condition Immunities | blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralysed, petrified, poisoned
property | Senses | blindsight 60 ft.(blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 7

description | Antimagic Susceptibility | The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an anti magic field. if targeted by dispel magic, the sword must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.
description | False Appearance | Whi le the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.
description | Longsword | Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: S (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.
